item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.QCXMIXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 8T Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 8T Global

Codename: willow

Version: V12.0.1.0.QCXMIXM | 10.0

Size: 3.7 GB

MD5: bca9f17e668c175804b32f75f95326ad

Changelog:
[Control center]
Optimization: Control center layout in landscape mode
[System]
Fix: Noise could be heard when the screen was turned off in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to October 2020. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 10

Download: Here
